newsitem.title: FINLAND: MERITA PLANS NO STADSHYPOTEK BID.
newsitem.headline: MERITA PLANS NO STADSHYPOTEK BID.

text.p: Finnish commercial banking group Merita Oy said on Monday it would not make a bid for Swedish mortgage bank Stadshypotek, denying a report in Swedish business daily Dagens Industri.
"We are not going to make any bid for Stadshypotek," Merita head spokeswoman Eira Palin-Lehtinen told Reuters by telephone.
"Nobody has been in contact with us and we have not been in contact with anyone regarding Stadshypotek," she said.
Dagens Industri wrote on Monday that "the new big Finnish bank Merita Bank is showing interest in Stadshypotek".
The Swedish finance ministry has said it intends to sell the state's 34 percent minority shareholding in Stadshypotek. Bids were due to be submitted on Monday.
